0 Param data.1 string m_text: This is mankind's true form!
Fear your mortality, fools! Reincarnation is but a fairy tale!
And if you cling to your false convictions, I'll send you to test them! Come! Who wants to see Beyond the Veil?
The Ark's gonna come for us! It'll take us all to the next world!
Ah, of course! The Ark!
Ha ha ha ha!
Maybe there is an Ark.
But YOU won't be getting on it.
You're wrong! You'll see!
The rich and powerful will never share it!
Not a chance.
I bet they're all boarding it right now. Arm in arm, bound for the Beyond!
Awww, you're being left behind. Quick! Better look for your little lifeboat before it sails away!
HA HA HA HA!
You don't want to be here when tragedy strikes!
Hey! Kagachi!
I'm not seeing things, am I? That was really Kushi just now, wasn't it.
Sure was.
So what's going on!? He looked like...he looked just like a Daemon!
What happened to him? What could change him like that?
There'll be time for talk later. Right now we have work to do.
Work? Are you kidding me!?
Kushi said he wanted to watch the realm burn.
It's up to the Veil Watch to stop him.
We're sworn to protect these people.
Why would Kushi want to see the world burn? He would never do anything like this!
You're right. He wouldn't.
But that isn't Kushi anymore. It's a mortal enemy of the Inner Kingdom.
I have no clue what you're talking about.
Funny. That makes two of us!
But there's no time to figure it out now! If we don't move fast, we'll lose everything and everyone that matters!
And then it will be too late!
Makes sense to me, Kagachi.
Heh. That'd be a first!
I'm just sayin' it makes sense that none of this makes sense.
So all we gotta do is focus on saving the city.
Evacuate every last man, woman, and child. Sound like a plan, Kagachi?
Hey! Wait up!
Seriously, that guy... When we get back, you got some explainin' to do!
What now, Kagachi?
There are too many people for the Watchers to evacuate on our own. We need to pay a visit to the palace.
What's going on here?
Weird. It seems like they knew this was going to happen.
But, that would mean...
You seem well prepared.
Almost as if you expected this. Strange, that.
Watch your tongue!
Who are you to accuse us?
Kagachi. Watcher.
A Watcher? Then protect your sovereign! Protect your kingdom!
A cannon's a lot like a sword, you know. Useless unless you keep it sharp.
From what I can see, you've been keeping these swords very sharp indeed.
The question is, why?
Silence! This does not concern you!
You don't deserve to rule.
But that's not my call to make. I'm just a Watcher, after all.
And I won't stand by as those that placed their faith in you die for nothing.
Good. Then I have a job for you.
Cannons need fuel to fire. Find some and bring it back here, on the double.
Get your own fuel.
I'm a Watcher, not your dog. I don't play fetch.
Don't get full of yourself, whelp.
You think you can protect this realm all by yourself?
What will you do if you fail? It will be too late for regrets then.
Besides, do you really think you can best Kushi?
We both want to protect the realm and its people. Lend us your strength. Help us, Watcher Kagachi.
Or would you rather waste your time growling at us?
All right.
I'll help you, but only on one condition.
You use these things only as a last resort. Got it?
This is what the cannons need to work, right?
That's right.
But they won't have to. I'll stop Kushi myself.

The cannons arrayed to battle Kushi only serve as a reminder of the realm's fragility.

They stand, motionless and waiting, but the silence of the city mocks them.

Meanwhile, Lady Lobelia trembles in fear of Kushi's prophesied tragedy.

Yet Kushi is nowhere to be seen...
So...what exactly happened with Kushi?
I'm not sure.
But the hatred inside him isn't his alone.
He's being twisted by the darkness of the Night Devil.
Kushi's "tragedy" will come. Mark my words.
Stop!
Hey, you.
Do you still believe in the Beyond?
Do you still have faith in a country that encourages death?
I...I do! I believe!
I see. In that case, you won't mind.
Huh?
This is madness!
The next world awaits, right?
We're fed up with the lies. We won't place our faith in an uncertain afterlife.
And we won't let the sovereign have her way. We want guarantees, so we're taking the Ark.
Enough! Your people are going to get murdered out there! Order your soldiers to withdraw, now!
No... No...
My kingdom...
The rioters are approaching the palace!
Dammit!
Was this your plan all along, Kushi? Or should I call you the Night Devil?
Did you want to watch this realm tear itself apart?
Why would a man like you do this?
If only I were stronger. If only I'd shown more kindness.
This isn't your fault.
You were the only one who showed the Night Devil kindness.
If it never figured out how to play nice, that's not your fault.
Kagachi...
That being said, we can't just let it get away with this.
I'm going to stop this fighting, and then I'm going to kill the Night Devil.
I won't let it terrorize this realm ever again.
O-Okay.
Stop.
You believed in this realm once, you can again. Don't throw away your lives, and don't betray your hearts!
Kushi is possessed by the evil of the Night Devil. He isn't himself!
He doesn't hate this realm. The Veil Watch would never betray you!
The Watch has seen the smiles and tears of souls who believed in the Beyond.
That's why I believe.
I believe that they'll be reborn in this world!
I believe in the promise of reincarnation!
No more promises! We want guarantees! GIVE US THE ARK!
Why wouldn't you listen!
Send them off with a smile, if you're such a true believer. Isn't that what Watchers do?
Put it down. That won't solve anything.
I... What am I doing?
This place was perfect. Wasn't that enough?
Get back here!
Stop my mother, I'm begging you!
Wait, don't tell me there really IS an Ark?
There must be something here!
Something only the sovereign has access to!
It's here! It has to be!
Something that can save us!
Work, damn you! Why won't you work!?
I'm the sovereign! Obey me!
What is this place?
What do you have there?
Shut up, shut up, SHUT UP!
Calm down. You're the sovereign. Act like it.
Heh. Heh heh heh.
That's right. I...I am the sovereign.
What is that?
I have no idea. It was here. It's always been here.
But only the true sovereign knows what it is.
"True" sovereign?
In other words, she's a fake.
Kushi?
The last sovereign was accused of dubious crimes and executed.
All thanks to Lady Lobelia.
What?
These are the Night Devil's memories. They're undoubtedly true.
Consider that shiny arsenal of hers, all ready for an emergency. Doesn't that seem paranoid to you?
She was afraid that one day she'd meet the same fate. Betrayed and murdered.
But none of that matters anymore.
What are you planning!?
To see this realm glut itself on despair.
Kushi!
This piece of junk has outlived its purpose.
What good is something that can only be used by the true heir to the throne?
The bloodline is broken, and it's her hands that are stained red.
You're one to talk.
This realm deserves to burn for believing in lies.
If anyone deserves to suffer it's us.
We've murdered people whose only crime was clinging to the idea of the afterlife.
None of us are without blame, Kushi. Justice is dead.
You're right. This world is rife with injustice.
What a good son you are.
But a true believer would've watched on with a smile as his mother crossed over.
I will save this realm.
I...will never...let you have it.
Do you mean in the afterlife?
Because here's a secret: there is no afterlife. This world will come to its end.
Isn't that nice to know? Now you won't become Lost.
You aren't Kushi anymore. You're the Night Devil, and I will kill you.
I loved life.
The laughter...
And the tears.
I loved every last day.
I was so blessed.
You've grown up strong, Kagachi.
Forgive me.
It's not your fault. The Night Devil forced you to do it.
No. I was in there with him.
When I lost Mayura, I...I could tell I was coming apart at the seams.
And then, when the Night Devil possessed me, it felt...good.
With my hatred free to rage, I felt liberated.
I get it. You don't have to
No. Listen to me.
This is important.
The Night Devil's memories, I saw them.
That thing is a Daemon whose soul is so fueled by hatred it couldn't reincarnate.
You're the only one who can save it.
Why me?
I don't know.
You'll have to find that answer yourself. Search for its origin, collect the pieces of its malice.
You're the only one who can be bound to it. In due course, it will find you.
And you'll be there at my side to face it.
Sorry. You have to handle this one yourself.
After what I tried to do to the kingdom, you wouldn't want my help anyway.
The key...is the girl, Linne. She is the link that binds you and the Night Devil together.
Follow your memories, girl. Take care of Kagachi for me.
Me?
Damn, I'm tired.
I think...it's time for me to go. I hope Mayura's waiting for me.
No... This isn't how it was supposed to happen.
Kagachi...
I love you, son. Even if you are a stubborn fool.
With a fool of a father.
Stubborn to the end...
